original_text:
my people are destroyed from lack of knowledge.
“Because you have rejected knowledge,
    I also reject you as my priests;
because you have ignored the law of your God,
    I also will ignore your children.
korean_text: 내 백성이 지식이 없으므로 망하는도다 네가 지식을 버렸으니 나도 너를 버려 내 제사장이 되지 못하게 할 것이요 네가 네 하나님의 율법을 잊었으니 나도 네 자녀들을 잊어버리리라

sentences.original_text: I also reject you as my priests
because you have ignored the law of your God
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 너희 하나님의 율법을 무시했기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: I also will ignore your children
